text: 14.19 Infrastructure impact assessments should demonstrate the expected impact of the development on the provision of local and strategic infrastructure, including but not limited to: z education – early years, primary, secondary, and specialist; z healthcare – primary care provision, adult social care provision; z sports and leisure facilities – sports halls, swimming pools, pitches; z publicly accessible open space; z community presence facilities (i.e. Idea Stores); z community facilities; z youth facilities; z energy infrastructure and utilities; and z emergency services. BACK TO POLICIES
